outline:
1. to reach, overtake, take hold upon
    1. (Hiphil)
      1. to overtake
      2. to reach, attain to, cause to reach
      3. to be able to secure, reach, have enough
kjv_def: ability, be able, attain (unto), (be able to, can) get, lay at, put, reach, remove, wax rich, [idiom] surely, (over-) take (hold of, on, upon).
